name: Separate broadcaster tests from main tests
notes: In test_debug_handler.valk: (1) Identify the 5 broadcaster tests that timeout (they test subscriber count, reconnect, etc). (2) Create two separate test lists: main-tests (non-broadcaster) and broadcaster-tests (the 5 that timeout). (3) Keep using test/run-async for main-tests. Build must succeed after changes.
accept: make build passes, two test lists exist (main-tests and broadcaster-tests), broadcaster-tests has 5 tests

name: Wire sequential execution for broadcaster tests
notes: Modify the test execution at end of test_debug_handler.valk: (1) Run main-tests with test/run-async first, (2) When main tests complete, run broadcaster-tests using run-tests-sequentially, (3) Call debug/reset-state between each broadcaster test. This requires modifying test-suite-timed-out logic and the final completion callback. Look at how test/run-async completion works.
accept: make build passes, running test shows main tests run first, then broadcaster tests run one at a time

name: Verify all 36 tests pass multiple times
notes: Run test_debug_handler.valk at least 5 times and verify all 36 tests pass each time. No TIMEOUT or FAIL should appear.
accept: 5 consecutive runs of build/valk test/test_debug_handler.valk all show 36 passed, 0 failed
